title: Question about Hextech Chests
body: Is it possible to find a certain skin shard inside hextech chests right after the skin is released on live servers?

replies.body: New content may not appear in hextech crafting right away.  I've seen a few cases where some players unlocked chests too soon, especially immediately after a new release.  I'd personally recommend waiting at-least 2 days for those items to become available through chests and unlocking.  Keep in mind that hextech is still random, so you won't be guaranteed any specific shards or content.  Be sure to also check out our [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide for more details.  Hope that helps!
